articles.author: By JOHN RABY AP Sports Writer
articles.title: McBride leads No. 17 West Virginia over No. 22 Texas Tech
articles.description: MORGANTOWN, W.Va. (AP) — Miles McBride scored a season-high 22 points, Oscar Tshiebwe added 17 rebounds and No. 17 West Virginia beat 22nd-ranked Texas Tech 66-54 on Saturday night.
articles.content: Texas Tech missed six straight shots, then found a gap in West Virginia's normally fortified defense and tried to mount a comeback with little help from its two best scorers. Freshman Jahmi'us Ramsey and Moretti had a basket apiece over the final 15 minutes.… [+910 chars]
